attributes.action: Make it a legal requirement for any MP to have at least a ten year career track record outside poltics and for any minister to have severl years experience of manging an organisation with at least 200 employees.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This an attempt to prevent a repeat of the last ten years or so which have seen a succession of managerial serial incompetents promoted to the position of minster.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
